attributes.action: promise the British people that he WILL call a general election by 3 June 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people will not tolerate ANY situation where a general election is "postponed" or "cancelled" due to "a national emergency"

rejection.details: The last possible date for the election is Thursday 3 June 2010.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
